net.bytebuddy.implementation.attribute

接口 AnnotationValueFilter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AnnotationValueFilter.Default

    public interface AnnotationValueFilter
    An annotation value filter is responsible for determining which values should be skipped and rather be represented as an annotation type's default values when writing an annotation to a class file.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  AnnotationValueFilter.Default
      A default implementation of an annotation value filter that applies the same strategy for any type, field or method.
      static interface  AnnotationValueFilter.Factory
      A factory for creating an annotation value filter for an annotation's target.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean isRelevant(AnnotationDescription annotationDescription, MethodDescription.InDefinedShape methodDescription)
      Checks if the given annotation value should be written as the value of the provided annotation property.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isRelevant

        boolean isRelevant(AnnotationDescription annotationDescription,
                   MethodDescription.InDefinedShape methodDescription)
        Checks if the given annotation value should be written as the value of the provided annotation property.
        参数:
        annotationDescription - The annotation value that is being written.
        methodDescription - The annotation method of which a value is being written.
        返回:
        true if the value should be written to the annotation.
